languages.text: "Я печалюсь о твоей судьбе, бывший собрат. Но грех твой слишком велик, и я не вправе противодействовать воле, изреченной Вольным Торговцем".
"I grieve for your fate, my former brother. Yet the gravity of your trespass is too great, and it is not within my right to defy the will proclaimed by the Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Я печалюсь о твоей судьбе, бывший собрат. Но грех твой слишком велик, и я не вправе противодействовать воле, изреченной Вольным Торговцем".

traits.locale_text: "I grieve for your fate, my former brother. Yet the gravity of your trespass is too great, and it is not within my right to defy the will announced by the Rogue Trader."
"I grieve for your fate, my former brother. Yet the gravity of your trespass is too great, and it is not within my right to defy the will announced by the Rogue Trader."
"I grieve for your fate, my former brother. Yet the gravity of your trespass is too great, and it is not within my right to defy the will proclaimed by the Rogue Trader."
"I grieve for your fate, my former brother. Yet the gravity of your trespass is too great, and it is not within my right to defy the will proclaimed by the Rogue Trader."
"I grieve for your fate, my former brother. Yet the gravity of your trespass is too great, and it is not within my right to defy the will proclaimed by the Rogue Trader."

languages.text: 「古き兄弟よ、私はあなたの運命を深く悲しんでいる。しかしあなたが犯したことの影響はあまりにも大きく、ローグトレーダーが公言している意志に背くのは私の力の範疇ではない」
languages.original_text: "I grieve for your fate, my former brother. Yet the gravity of your trespass is too great, and it is not within my right to defy the will proclaimed by the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「古き兄弟よ、私はあなたの運命を深く悲しんでいる。しかしあなたが犯したことの影響はあまりにも大きく、ローグトレーダーが公言している意志に背くのは私の力の範疇ではない」

languages.text: “我为你的命运深感悲哀，我曾经的兄弟。不过，你犯下了的罪行过于严重，我无权反对行商浪人的意志。”
languages.original_text: "I grieve for your fate, my former brother. Yet the gravity of your trespass is too great, and it is not within my right to defy the will proclaimed by the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “我为你的命运深感悲哀，我曾经的兄弟。不过，你犯下了的罪行过于严重，我无权反对行商浪人的意志。”

languages.text: "Ich trauere um Euer Schicksal, mein ehemaliger Bruder. Doch die Schwere Eures Verstoßes ist zu groß, und ich habe kein Recht, mich dem Willen zu widersetzen, wie {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ihn verkündet hat."
languages.original_text: "I grieve for your fate, my former brother. Yet the gravity of your trespass is too great, and it is not within my right to defy the will proclaimed by the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Ich trauere um Euer Schicksal, mein ehemaliger Bruder. Doch die Schwere Eures Verstoßes ist zu groß, und ich habe kein Recht, mich dem Willen zu widersetzen, wie {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ihn verkündet hat."

languages.text: « Je déplore votre sort, mon frère. Cependant, la gravité de votre intrusion est trop grande et je ne suis pas en mesure de défier la volonté {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "I grieve for your fate, my former brother. Yet the gravity of your trespass is too great, and it is not within my right to defy the will proclaimed by the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Je déplore votre sort, mon frère. Cependant, la gravité de votre intrusion est trop grande et je ne suis pas en mesure de défier la volonté {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: «Lamento tu destino, antiguo hermano mío. Pero tu ofensa es demasiado grave, y no está en mi mano desafiar la voluntad {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "I grieve for your fate, my former brother. Yet the gravity of your trespass is too great, and it is not within my right to defy the will proclaimed by the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «Lamento tu destino, antiguo hermano mío. Pero tu ofensa es demasiado grave, y no está en mi mano desafiar la voluntad {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: "Kaderin için yas tutacağım eski kardeşim. Ancak günahlarının ağırlığı görmezden gelinemez. Ayrıca Hür Tacir tarafından beyan edilen isteğe karşı gelmek haddime değil."
languages.original_text: "I grieve for your fate, my former brother. Yet the gravity of your trespass is too great, and it is not within my right to defy the will proclaimed by the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Kaderin için yas tutacağım eski kardeşim. Ancak günahlarının ağırlığı görmezden gelinemez. Ayrıca Hür Tacir tarafından beyan edilen isteğe karşı gelmek haddime değil."
